diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $TR$ is $18$ units.
The length of the line $WT$ is $12$ units.
The measure of angle $TWV$ is $60$ degrees.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $W$ and $V$.
The line $TA$ is perpendicular to the line $WV$.
line_instances: There are lines $TR$, $VA$, $VR$, $WA$, $WT$, and $WV$ forming the parallelogram $TRVW$ and its diagonals.
